downloadTitle: What's new for IT Pros in Project Server 2013: Part 3 - Operations
downloadDescription: Discuss Project Server 2013 operations improvements including Windows PowerShell, Active Directory Synchronization, Log Level Manager and Queue Stats Manager.
detailsSection: Discuss Project Server 2013 operations improvements including Windows PowerShell, Active Directory Synchronization, Log Level Manager and Queue Stats Manager.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office application:
    • Microsoft Office PowerPoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to your desired file location.
  3. Find the file where you chose to save it and double-click it to open it.
